title: Is the Christian Reformed Church dying for failing to resolve conflict?
description:
Synod Overture 18 lays out a case that failure to address conflict has put the CRC into a death spiral. What the CRC needs to do is to address this conflict and heal the wounds of it. 

Agenda for Synod https://www.crcna.org/sites/default/files/2018_agenda.pdf

CRC Voices Listserve https://groups.yahoo.com/neo/groups/crc-voices/info 

Guests: David Snapper, on of the authors of the Overture
Rod Hugen pastor of The Village in Tucson AZ http://www.villagersonline.com/ 

Brad Vos pastor of Crossway Church Battleground OR https://www.crosswaychurchwa.com/
